price: Und sie schmiedeten Ränke, und (auch) Allah schmiedete Ränke; und Allah ist der beste Ränkeschmied.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
